# ggplot-extension-club


A repository as a [discussion place](https://github.com/teunbrand/ggplot-extension-club/discussions) for extending the ggplot2 R package. 

As a bit of background: some people have been meeting virtually every few months and discussing ggplot2 extension. 

Meetings:


```{r, echo = F}
tibble::tribble(~ date, ~ presenter, ~ package, ~`special topic`, #~link,
"2024-08-19", "Toby Hocking", "{animint2}", NA, 
"2024-06-22", "Elio Campitelli", "{ggnewscale}", NA,
"2024-05-11", "Jonathan Sidi", "{ggedit}", NA,
"2024-03-12", "Di Cook", "{GGally}", "A conversation with Di Cook ",
"2024-02-10", "Malcolm Barrett", "{ggdag}", NA,
"2023-11-04", "Nicola Rennie", "{ggflowchart}", NA,
"2023-11-04", "W. Joel Schneider", "{arrowheadr}", NA,
"2023-09-02", "Jonathan Carroll", "{ggeasy}", NA,
"2023-06-10", "Daniel Sjoberg", "{ggsurvfit}", NA,
"2023-04-15", "Gina Reynolds", "{ggcirclepack}", NA,
"2022-01-28", "Claus Wilke", NA, "'Fundamentals of Data Visualization' book project",
"2022-07-16", "June Choe", "{ggtrace}", NA,
"2022-06-11", "Teun van den Brand", "{ggh4x}", NA,

meetings
```

This repository will accommodate some discussion outside those meetings and coordination efforts.  Feel free to participate in discussions and be in touch!
